contents: Article 24 (Application Management) ① If an athlete wishes to get a job at a workplace sports department and participate in activities as an athlete, he or she may apply or the head of the affiliated organization may recommend the person. However, if you are not hired by the sports department at your workplace that received your application, you may be re-recommended to the sports department at another workplace. ② Member sports organizations receive and manage application forms used for employment from the Sports Council and issue them to athletes seeking employment after signing and sealing them. ③ If an athlete applies for recommendation to the head of his/her organization for employment, the head of his/her organization must make a recommendation within 15 days unless there are special reasons. ④ The head of the affiliated organization that issued the employment recommendation must submit a copy of the recommendation to the member sports organization within 7 days from the date of issuance of the recommendation, and the member sports organization must immediately notify the relevant workplace sports department.
